pullRequest.body:
The only remaining occurrences are in Topology/Algebra.

If you are moving or deleting declarations, please include these lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

- Vector.* -> Mathlib.Vector.*
- ...

Deletions:
- Nat.bit1_add_bit1
- ...

below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/10367173209/job/28698006815)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/10367173209/job/28698007339)
I think you're mangling what was originally `open_locale` with the bare `open`. Can you restore what was there before, but replacing one of the `open` with `open scoped`
I am aware of this issue in general. In this case, replacing the `open` by `open scoped` errors.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - chore(Topology): remove more bare open Classical
